remarks: A measure is sub-additive with respect to union.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Oct-2017.)
statement:
measunl.1 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( measures ` S ) ) $.
measunl.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. S ) $.
measunl.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. S ) $.
measunl $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( A u. B ) ) <_ ( ( M ` A ) +e ( M ` B ) ) ) $.
